text:
Hi deadlines for us depend on whether they are internal ones or client ones. In my experience they have always been quite flexible. They tend to shift around a lot. Whereas at uni those deadlines tended to be quite hard and fast. You will certainly have milestones and targets for shots that are assigned to you.

I do enjoy the role but it really depends on the team around you. If you have a great team you can work on the worst subject material and still have fun. Certain movie studios that begin with M and end with arvel can be quite tricky to work for because they delay the approval of shots/assets until the very end. Keeps us hanging on and it's a bit of a pain to work with.

How long do you have for the project? Is there a way you would specifically like me to help/advise you?
